name: Michelin Star Malfunction
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic setting, robots have fully taken over in humanities place, and are now trying to emulate humanity. To this end, they are completing everyday human tasks, such as doing office work and eating "Human food". Michelin Star Malfunction has the player take the role of a cooking robot in this world, who must try to create "human food" as quickly as possible to fulfill as many orders as possible.
